main event: Multiple reports of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) were observed at different locations, including Stead AFB in Nevada and Arcata, California, in 1952.
interesting points: The UFOs were observed to travel at high speeds, change directions, and disappear, leaving vapor trails.
The objects appeared as round, orange, luminous, and metallic, larger than the full moon in the sky.
Witnesses reported the objects to be traveling at an altitude of 13,000 to 23,000 feet and at speeds estimated to be in excess of 1000 miles per hour.
One observer described the objects as egg-shaped, approximately 30 feet in diameter, and traveling at an altitude of 2000 to 3000 feet.
Some witnesses reported seeing the objects move behind trees and change intensity or pulsation.
location: Stead AFB, NV and Arcata, CA
